name: Mellel Document
summary: Learn about .MELLEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Mellel comes with various features for composing academic documents, including bibliography tools, helpful outline views, and footnote and endnote management. When you save a document with Mellel, the app creates a MELLEL file to store its contents.
To create a MELLEL file, select File → New... or Open Template (if you want to start from a pre-designed template). Then, compose the document and select File → Save or Save As....

instructions: You can open a MELLEL file with Mellel in macOS. To open a MELLEL file, select File → Open....
Mellel can convert MELLEL files to the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
